```{r}
class(mtcars)
```


```{r}
mtcars <- as_tibble(mtcars)
```

```{r}
class(mtcars)
```

```{r}
rm(mtcars)
mtcars <- as_tibble(mtcars, rownames = "Model")
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
mtcars[mtcars$Model %in% c("Merc 280", "Ferrari Dino", "Merc 450SLC"), names(mtcars) %in% c("Model", "mpg",  "wt")]
```

```{r}
#| paged.print: false
filter(mtcars, mpg < 20)
```
